topics.body:
i think is story 2.

the fact diggs managed to tell such a detailed story about a former pyromaniac who was hired by a mob to kill people who now works in a shit bar job while having to go to therapy from that moment on, who had a gay relationship to feel better but could never contact that person again, and then notices how his former mob goes to his house and burns it down with his kids in it.

in only 2 minutes.
